channel.title: [Emulous/Paradox2/Riotscape]Some Things
channel.description:
1. When I run the server:
[code] [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: Launching Paradox 2.0 ... [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: at server.world.map.I.containsKey(I.java:392) [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: at server.world.map.I.I(I.java:26) [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: at server.world.map.VirtualWorld.init(VirtualWorld.java: 27) [1/25/10 4:50 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:85) [/code]
How does that get fixed?
2. How can I get the server to work with Galkon's 474 client? 3. Is there an autospawn with all 317 npcs that will work with Emu/Para/Riot?
